definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: tyrant, lord (Philist. loan-word);—pl. abs. [[הַסְּרָנִים]] Ju Jdg 16:30 + 2 t.; cstr. [[סַרְנֵי]] Ju Jdg 3:3 + 16 t.; sf. [[סַרְנֵיכֶם]] 1Sa 6:4; —only of tyrants, lords of the Philistines, five in no. Ju Jdg 3:3, Jos 13:3 (D), 1Sa 6:16, 1Sa 6:18 cf. v:1Sa 6:4, i.e. appar., one ruling each of the five cities (named 1Sa 6:17); without the numeral Ju Jdg 16:5 + 6 t. Ju Jdg 16, 1Sa 5:8 + 7 t. 1 S, + 1Ch 12:20 (Bear Ginsb; v:19 van d. H.).
